oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clover seed production - in organic and conventional cropping systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Boelt, B.
Tveden-Nyborg, S.
Hansen, L.M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Production systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: White clover (Trifolium repens L.) is an important component in grassland mixtures and as a green manure crop. Since Denmark has excellent conditions for white clover seed production and holds the position of the largest producer within the EU emphasis has been placed on developing an organic production of white clover seeds.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Boelt, B.; Tveden-Nyborg, S. and Hansen, L.M. (2010) Clover seed production - in organic and conventional cropping systems. Poster at: The 7th International Herbage Seed Conference, Dallas, Texas, 11-14 April 2010.
